db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: ButtonStyle is part of Styling Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: You can create a custom button by replacing the "background" delegate of the ButtonStyle with a custom design.
If you need a custom label, you can replace the label item.

db:section.db:title: background : Component
db:section.db:para: This defines the background of the button.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] control : Button
db:section.db:para: The Button this style is attached to.

db:section.db:title: label : Component
db:section.db:para: This defines the label of the button.

db:section.db:title: padding group
db:section.db:para: This grouped property holds the top, left, right and bottom padding.
